医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
试验表明，为急性背痛或颈痛患者开阿片类药物没有任何益处悉尼大学领导的一项世界首例试验表明，阿片类止痛药物在缓解急性背部和颈部疼痛方面并不比安慰剂更有效，甚至可能造成伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Trial-shows-no-benefit-of-prescribing-an-opioid-for-people-with-acute-back-or-neck-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Trial-shows-no-benefit-of-prescribing-an-opioid-for-people-with-acute-back-or-neck-pain.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa960524-5122-41ce-bfa3-816b0cb4d5a1 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:49:57 -0400 Trial shows no benefit of prescribing an opioid for people with acute back or neck pain
英格兰和威尔士越来越多的医生选择自愿提前退休官方数据显示，越来越多的医生选择自愿提前退休，而不是等到退休年龄才领取养老金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Increasing-numbers-of-doctors-in-England-and-Wales-are-opting-to-take-voluntory-early-retirement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Increasing-numbers-of-doctors-in-England-and-Wales-are-opting-to-take-voluntory-early-retirement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f220f366-ed32-4a8c-8be0-7104f5429d0b Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:30:01 -0400 Increasing numbers of doctors in England and Wales are opting to take voluntary early retirement
使用更年期激素疗法与痴呆和阿尔茨海默病发病率增加相关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项丹麦大型研究表明，使用更年期激素疗法与痴呆和阿尔茨海默病发病率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Use-of-menopausal-hormone-therapy-linked-with-increased-rate-of-dementia-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Use-of-menopausal-hormone-therapy-linked-with-increased-rate-of-dementia-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10889f42-f25d-4c55-854d-898bc0f13566 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:25:50 -0400 Use of menopausal hormone therapy associated with increased rate of dementia and Alzheimer's
阐明肠脑轴在自闭症中的作用该研究调查了自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 中肠道和大脑之间的关系，确定了与 ASD 表型、饮食模式和炎症相关的微生物特征和代谢产物。这些发现提供了关于肠-脑轴在自闭症谱系障碍中的作用及其对理解和管理这种疾病的潜在影响的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Elucidating-the-role-of-the-gut-brain-axis-in-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Elucidating-the-role-of-the-gut-brain-axis-in-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32a293f3-0920-4fa2-9026-bf7983714ff4 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:19:00 -0400 Elucidating the role of the gut-brain-axis in autism
临床试验显示新药可有效治疗溃疡性结肠炎阿姆斯特丹 UMC 与世界各地的同事一起研究了一种新药，可有效治疗溃疡性结肠炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/New-drug- effective-as-a-treatment-against-ulcerative-colitis-clinical-trial-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/New-drug- effective-as-a-treatment-against-ulcerative-colitis-clinical-trial-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88344823-d576-42d3-8cb6-659f5ecb89d1 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:14:13 -0400 New drug effective as a treatment against ulcerative colitis, clinical trial shows
新型抗癌药物被发现可使肿瘤细胞对铁死亡敏感由慕尼黑亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的 Marcus Conrad 博士领导的一组研究人员发现了一种新型抗癌药物，称为 icFSP1，它可以使癌细胞对铁死亡敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Novel-anti-cancer-drug-found-to-sensitize-tumor-cells-to-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Novel-anti-cancer-drug-found-to-sensitize-tumor-cells-to-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fab4dc8-d481-4eba-9bfc-0635b7507c9d Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:09:31 -0400 Novel anti-cancer drug found to sensitize tumor cells to ferroptosis
基因编辑在社交和传统媒体上获得比转基因生物更高的好感度近年来，基因编辑和转基因生物（GMO）一直是备受争议的话题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Gene-editing-receives-higher-favorability- ratings-than-GMOs-in-social-and-traditional-media.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Gene-editing-receives-higher-favorability- ratings-than-GMOs-in-social-and-traditional-media.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d77c35a-8314-48b9-9a06-b8731c15f52a Wed, 28 Jun 2023 22:01:05 -0400 Gene editing receives higher favorability ratings than GMOs in social and traditional media
胶质母细胞瘤细胞被发现在有序与无序之间存在“临界点”胶质母细胞瘤是最具侵袭性的脑癌。尽管经过数十年的重大努力和临床试验，肿瘤的存活率仍然停滞不前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Glioblastoma-cells-found-to-have-e28098ritic-pointe28099- Between-order-and-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Glioblastoma-cells-found-to-have-e28098ritic-pointe28099- Between-order-and-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=399af1ca-d03a-46cb-bfa9-b864a2c52a58 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:34:24 -0400 Glioblastoma cells found to have ‘critical point’ between order and disorder
研究发现孤独的人以不同的方式看待世界俄罗斯作家兼哲学家列夫·托尔斯泰在写下《安娜·卡列尼娜》的开场白时可能已经说到点子上：“幸福的家庭都是相似的，不幸的家庭各有各的不幸。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Lonely-people-process-the-world- Differently-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Lonely-people-process-the-world- Differently-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e00272a-da7f-4178-bd59-c16b79d890b0 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:18:42 -0400 Lonely people process the world differently, study finds
研究揭示女大学生不健康饮食习惯和睡眠质量差一项横断面研究揭示了女性健康科学学院学生不健康的饮食习惯和饮酒情况，凸显了营养教育和生活方式干预的必要性。观察到常量营养素失衡、睡眠质量差和对地中海饮食的依从性低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-reveals-unhealthy-eating-habits-and-poor-sleep-quality-among-female-college-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-reveals-unhealthy-eating-habits-and-poor-sleep-quality-among-female-college-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de34886f-a476-4d3e-a589-a96e2d18a9ad Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:10:00 -0400 Study reveals unhealthy eating habits and poor sleep quality among female college students
